content.rendered:
Directed by Navaniat Singh

Written by Bunty Rathore. Vankush Arora. Anant Ahluwalia

Cast Dharmendra (Jeet Parmar). Sunny Deol (Puran). Bobby Deol (Kala). Kriti Kharbanda (Chikoo). Govardhan Asrani (Nanu). Satish Kaushik (Bedi). Binnu Dhillon (Billa) . Bharat Bhatia (Sainath). Arvinder Bhatti (Traffic Policeman). Anita Devgan (Sati). Paresh Ganatra (Paresh). Mohan Kapur (Marfatea (as Mohan Kapoor)). Salman Khan (Mastana). Meenakshi Mani (Jigna Mausi). Meenaxi Mani (Jigna Mausi). Jimmy Rampal (Sikh Paying Guest). Rekha (Special Appearance). Gurmeet Saajan (Fauji Taya). Sharat Saxena (Judge Sunil Parekh). Hema Sharma (Dr. Subhi). Rajesh Sharma (Advocate Bhatia). Shatrughan Sinha (Judge Sunil Sinha). Sonakshi Sinha (Special Appearance). Chirag Vohra (Jignesh)

Language Hindi

Producers Akshay Gada. Dhaval Gada. Kushal Gada. Neeraj Gala. Ujwal Hegde. Reshmaa Kadakia. Hetvi Karia. Ginny Khanuja. Aarushi Malhotra. Rupesh Mali. Naveen Mathur. Kuldeep Rathore. Suniel S. Saini. Kamayani Punia Sharma

Production Soham Rockstar Entertainment. Intercut Entertainment. Pen Studio
